name: Versabots
description:
This is a prototype for a local co-op multiplayer game with sci-fi theme.

Customise your robot using its 6 skills.
Remember that Less of one skill is more of another.

Try different skill combinations, 4 normal plus 4 special weapons.
Lives and ammunition for special weapons are shared among players.

Check the screenshots for input.

Up to 4 players, 4 controllers supported and 2 players can use keyboard input.

This is a prototype.
Graphic is just placeholder.
Currently no audio.
Bugs are present.

Sorry for the inconvenience.

Prototype developed in 25 hours.
